product_name: Royal Robbins Windjammer Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you travel in the off-seasons you may need light coverage, whether on a catamaran sail or a hike to the ruins under the full moon. The women's Royal Robbins Windjammer Jacket fills the bill. Soft polyester microfiber is durable, wrinkle resistant and quick drying, great for travel. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection and has a durable water repellent finish so splashes roll right off. Adjustable hood, hem and cuffs. Underarm eyelets vent excess heat when you hike; wind flap behind center-front zipper keeps warmth in when it's chilly. Royal Robbins Windjammer Jacket for women packs into its own pocket. Zippered hand pockets; zippered chest pocket. Dropped back hem adds extra coverage. Closeout.
short_description: When you travel in the off-seasons you may need light coverage, whether on a catamaran sail or a hike to the ruins under the full moon. The women's Royal Robbins Windjammer Jacket fills the bill.
